org.openimaj.image.connectedcomponent.proc

Class BoundaryDistanceDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.connectedcomponent.proc.BoundaryDistanceDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureVectorProvider<DoubleFV>, org.openimaj.image.processor.connectedcomponent.ConnectedComponentProcessor

    public class BoundaryDistanceDescriptor
extends Object
implements org.openimaj.image.processor.connectedcomponent.ConnectedComponentProcessor, FeatureVectorProvider<DoubleFV>
    Distance-from-centroid descriptor for convex shapes. Sweeps the edge of the shape over all angles in 0..360 and records the distance from the centroid. Scale invariance is optionally achieved by normalising the resultant vector to sum to 1. Rotation invariance is optionally achieved by measuring angles from the dominant orientation of the connected component.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
